channel.title: Vocals help
channel.description: right i wanna give it a shot at screamo vocals like growls ect but the only one i can do is a high pitched emo type thing any1 got any tips on how to improve also anytips on general vocals would help :)

item.title: Vocals help
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

If it hurts, you either can’t do it or you are too young. If you are about 17-18+ you’ll never be able to without fucking up your vocal chords. If you are younger then 17, just wait until your vocal chords develop more. Don’t try it too often because it will seriously fuck you up like Mopman said.

Read full topic

item.title: Vocals help
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Do not try and do it if you don’t know what you’re doing, you can fuck yourself up, seriously.

Read full topic

item.title: Vocals help
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Well if you cannot take lessons perhaps reading some stuff on google, its only really the basics you needs to know (e.g. making sure your pushing the air out with your belly and not anything else, and also not straining your throat - which alot of untrained rock singers do)

Read full topic

item.title: Vocals help
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

Well, you can change the pitch of your normal voice too, can’t you. This works similar.

yes but it hurts if i try lower pitched

[quote=“davidude36, post:3, topic:138143”]First off do you know how to sing normally, properly?

I decided to sign up for singing lessons randomly last year at school and i was suprised how much i have been taught, it definatly helps me.

If you have no idea how to sing properly then i don’t think you should try to do screamo.

Also i absolutely hate screamo… i dont see the point in it and it just hurts to listen to it![/quote]
i wold like to take lessons but where i live i havnt herd of any1 that does them and even if i did then it would probbs cost quite a bit

[quote=“goatee, post:4, topic:138143”][quote author=soul raever link=topic=189904.msg1712205#msg1712205 date=1188401955]
right i wanna give it a shot at screamo vocals like growls ect but the only one i can do is a high pitched emo type thing any1 got any tips on how to improve
also anytips on general vocals would help
[/quote]

Lol high pitched emo thing. Wait until your voice gets deeper maybe?[/quote]

i have a rather deep voice anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Vocals help
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“soul raever, post:1, topic:138143”]right i wanna give it a shot at screamo vocals like growls ect but the only one i can do is a high pitched emo type thing any1 got any tips on how to improve
also anytips on general vocals would help :)[/quote]

Lol high pitched emo thing. Wait until your voice gets deeper maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: Vocals help
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

First off do you know how to sing normally, properly?

I decided to sign up for singing lessons randomly last year at school and i was suprised how much i have been taught, it definatly helps me.

If you have no idea how to sing properly then i don’t think you should try to do screamo.

Also i absolutely hate screamo… i dont see the point in it and it just hurts to listen to it!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Well, you can change the pitch of your normal voice too, can’t you. This works similar.
